doodlepad

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • doodlepad.Layer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Shape>

    public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Shape>
    An object representing a drawing layer for the Pad class. Each Layer maintains its own collection of Shapes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark F. Russo, PhD
